duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinating and managing the full life cycle of grant awards and contracts.
Leading grant writing and developing strategies to engage new and existing foundation and institutional partners.
Overseeing administrative duties, requirements by fiscal sponsor, and logistics for funders and clients.
Supporting the Executive Director in developing fundraising and marketing plans and objectives.
Managing relationships and ensuring compliance with funder requirements.
Creating and managing fundraising events and cultivating relationships with donors.
Updating marketing materials and supporting the creation of marketing-communications content.
Providing support in the day-to-day operations of the organization and representing the organization to the public.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree. Degree in business, public administration, or communications-related fields is a plus.
